import React,{useEffect}from 'react' import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import {Row,Col,ListGroup,Image,Form,Button,Card, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import { addToCart } from '../actions/cartActions' import { useParams } from 'react-router' import { CART_ADD_ITEMS } from '../constants/cartConstants' const Cart = ({}) => { const {id,qty} = useParams() const dispatch=useDispatch() const cart=useSelector((state)=>state.cart) const {cartItems}=cart useEffect(()=>{ if(id){ dispatch(addToCart(id,qty)) } },[dispatch,id,qty]) return (

Shopping cart

{cartItems.length===0?Your cart is empty Go back :( {cartItems.map(items=>( {item.name} ${items.price} dispatch(addToCart(item.product,Number(e.target.value)))}> { [...Array(item.countInStock).keys()].map((x)=>( ))} ))} )} ) } export default Cart
